<<<<<<< HEAD
The counter-plot, or, The close conspiracy of atheism and schism opened and so defeated and the doctrine and duty of evangelical obedience or Christian loyalty thereby asserted / by a real member of this most envy'd as most admired, because, best reformed Protestant Church of England. Real member of this most envy'd, as, most admired, because, best reformed Protestant Church of England.
[6], 39, [1] p.
Printed for Henry Brome ..., London : 1680.
Advertisement on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
=======
